title: aria-expanded attribute
description: Indicates whether the element, or another grouping element it controls, is currently expanded or collapsed.

assertions.title: convey the "false" value
examples: Most screen readers will announce the state as "collapsed"

assertions.title: convey the "true" value
examples: Most screen readers will announce the state as "expanded"

assertions.title: convey change in value
examples: If the element with aria-expanded has focus when its expanded state changes, the new state value will be announced (either "expanded" or "collapsed"). Some screen readers will re-announce the entire element, including name, role, and other properties and states.
